poem:
The Statistician's Path

Numbers spoke in his hands,  
a quiet dance of logic,  
illuminating the dark halls  
of learning. 

He, an architect of insight,  
spun equations into play,  
made children laugh  
with the language of sums,  
counting joy in every class,  
an endless, living graph.
